page.title: 14POYNTON PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: We interviewed Mrs.C.Presswood,Parish Councillor,who explained there are 17 councillors who are elected by people who live in the village whose names are on the electoral roll.Their job is to keep an eye on how the village grows.They are responsible for looking after the Civic Hall,Poynton Park the street lighting on estates footpaths across fields,they are allowed a small sum from the general rate to pay for this.They see the main problem in 1985 in Poynton as being the need for a by-pass round the village to avoid the heavy increase in through traffic which will occur when the Hazel Grove by-pass is opened.The Parish Council feel that Poynton should not grow any larger,and aim to protect the green belt,and consolidate what we have got.
